name: Upnext
tagline: We design and develop. You grow.
description:
We are a market leader in software development for the Mobile Money, Internet of Things and Finance Technology industries. Our services range from technology consulting and business analysis to user experience design, software engineering and solution integration. We work with banks, payment service providers, mobile network operators and startups. We are a 70+ strong team of experts which is constantly scaling.
We offer extensive expertise and a portfolio of top case studies in the fields of Fintech and IoT. We have been on the forefront of payment technology for over 10 years, designing and engineering successful tailor-made end-to-end mobile money services. We are experts in NFC, HCE, Tokenization, Mobile Wallets, Payment Gateways, mPOS, Wearables, iBeacon and many other technologies. We are based in the heart of Poland - Warsaw - and we have an international company culture.
